body.p: Touching the “Log” button icon on the Home Screen displays the Event Log.

The Event Log Screen is a record of all events that have taken place while the STS have been in operational. Each event or alarm is Time/Date stamped in the order of occurrence. These events,(which include alarms, abnormalities, and operator logins and logouts) are described in the center panel. The arrows on the right side of the panel allow the operator to scroll through events.
When the Clear Icon is pressed all events in the Log are cleared from the screen. This action can only be completed by the Administrator.
